I know this is a bit off topic, but I've been feeling a lot of kindness from people lately.

I've had a lot of friends who have been very kind to me, like telling me they'll make time for me because they're busy, or when I have to go out after work, some of my friends have even stayed a little bit earlier to wait for me.
Or when I'm busy, and they're not that busy, but because I'm busy, they want to go somewhere I want to go.
My family and friends have all been so kind to me, and so many of them.
Like everyone else, the other day, the other day, I'm filming right now, after the screening in Makuhari, and I've had two screenings in Makuhari.
I visited Osaka and Tokyo for two days at the screening in Makuhari, and there were people who came all the way to Osaka to see me.
There were people who came to Osaka to see me, there were people who waited for me in Osaka, and there were people who came from Osaka to Tokyo to see me.
I think there are a lot of people who come to see me because they follow my guess, and of course there are a lot of people who come to see me even if they don't guess me.
I think there are a lot of people who spend a lot of time on me, on everyone else, and on us, so I'd like to thank you all for your time.
I am so grateful that there are so many people who give their time to us, and I really appreciate it.
